Articles.Content: Wow. That sentence clearly sums up my feelings upon reading the number of spammers denied registration. That's some good software there, makes me rather glad my firsts posts were moderated.
Considering it refused to let me register with my hotmail account so I had to use one of my alternate emails to register, you have to wonder how many other's got denied wrongfully

The what? Where?

I agree, what's this Spam-O-Matic?

It's designed to stop spammers, simply. I (don't)have a conspiracy theory that it's actually designed to help spammers, hence the name. Anti-Spam-O-Matic, THAT'S the program you need for stopping spam.

Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaand nevermind. Statistics are on the main page, below the members online area. Damn, is all i can say.

Edited May 22, 2013 by Kurile
